title: Practice Challenge
description: Create a simple access control system for a secure building.
instructions:
1. Create variables: `isEmployee` (true), `hasKeycard` (true), `securityLevel` (2).
2. Access is granted if:
   - Person is an employee AND has a keycard
   - OR security level is 3 (admin access)
3. Display "Access Granted" or "Access Denied".

testCases.description: Grants access for employee with keycard

hints.text: Use parentheses to group: `if ((isEmployee && hasKeycard) || securityLevel === 3)`

commonMistakes.correction: Use `&&` for AND and `||` for OR.
